text: Sawenehe manungsa ana kang ngucap: "Kitra pracaya ing Allah". Nanging menawa dialani dening wong kafir, wedine marang brahalaning manungsa digawe padha karo wedine marang siksane Allah. Dene menawa ana pitulungane Pangeranira marang wong mukmin, banjur celathu, "Temen aku iki salawase bareng sira kabeh". "Allah iku apa ora wuninga marang sakrenteging atine sa-alam kabeh
